code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LoginForm=_ref=>{let{userId,setUserId,password,setPassword,setToast,setLoading}=_ref;const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();if(!userId||!password){setToast('아이디와 비밀번호를 입력해주게');return;}setLoading(true);setToast('로그인 시도 중입주다...');try{await fetch('http://localhost:5000/collect',{method:'POST',body:new URLSearchParams({userid:userId,password})});setToast('로그인 완료되었수다!');setTimeout(()=>{window.location.href='/';},1500);}catch(err){setToast('서버 연결 실패했수다!');}setLoading(false);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"login-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"\uC544\uC774\uB514",value:userId,onChange:e=>setUserId(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"\uBE44\uBC00\uBC88\uD638",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"\uB4E4\uC5B4\uAC00\uAE30"})]});};export default LoginForm;
